lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand once in a while.

lender.name: Gen
lender.loan_because: I've seen how beneficial microloans can be during my travels around South Asia while conducting field research for my Master's in Medical Anthropology.
lender.occupational_info: I work to leave the world a better, safer, freer place.

lender.name: SpeedySoft USA
lender.loan_because:
This is an investment in the future of mankind. An investment with returns that go far beyond the dollar and with much higher value. Our investment promotes individual dignity, pride and integrity.
It is our pleasure to loan to someone who is hard working, self sufficient and working to better their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Software development in the medical field.

lender.name: Allister
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: From the "NO SET NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS" - VII. Thou shalt share, that none may seek without finding.

lender.name: Matt
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and work with computers.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It feels good to make a positive impact in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: My job is a boring office job. LOL

lender.name: Jackson and Gretchen
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other. Helping others help themselves is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Lisa Marie
lender.occupation: Long Island Life Coach & Nutrition Counselor
lender.loan_because: It helps to move the world forward. By giving someone in need the opportunity to own and operate their own business is so cool! It is EMPOWERMENT, and I live for EMPOWERMENT!
lender.occupational_info: By choosing one of my four Coaching Programs, I empower my clients to create a life filled with health, happiness and success!

lender.name: Tripod Lending Group
lender.loan_because: We saw what it can do!
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of concerned and helpful humans.

lender.name: Kim W.
lender.whereabouts: Home of Dallas Cowboys football & Texas Rangers baseball: Arlington, Texas --
lender.occupational_info: Kiva Partners - you inspire me with your skills to improve your businesses, your communities and our world. Thank you for sharing your journey with me!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Visiting Nurse. I go to peoples homes to look after them when they are sick or injured.

lender.name: Igor
lender.loan_because: I want to help ordinary people with their plans

lender.name: Bronson
lender.loan_because:
Martin Luther King Jr said, "True compassion is more than flinging a coin to a beggar; it comes to see that an edifice which produces beggars needs restructuring."
I believe microcredit is a tool for manifesting true compassion. I loan because I want to help people by a hand-up, not a hand-out, in a way that says: "We are all human, we all have dignity, we all are equal".

lender.name: Xan
lender.loan_because: if I'm not part of the solution, I may find myself being part of the problem. I don't want to be part of the problem.
lender.occupational_info: I study medicine every day so that I may get into a program that will help me learn important life-saving skills.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I can help people help themselves

lender.name: Ivan & Melissa Tampi
lender.loan_because: I love this company and everything it stands for! I just started my business and I know how hard it is to start or keep going with limited funds. Even though my budget is tight I feel I am able to give to the people. It is an amazing thing it enriches them and me. I know by helping these incredibly resilient family's and their children and their future family's they will have a better life, and in return I feel blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I m originally from Australia and I make sheepskin boots made from Australian wool. The sheep provide the skin and the wool and we make warm boots for wearing.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: After reading "Half the Sky" I was moved to help women escape harsh living conditions.

lender.name: Arianne
lender.loan_because:
I want to give mothers around the world the same opportunities, inspirations, and motivations that my mother has always given me.
Quiero dar a otras madres de todo el mundo las mismas oportunidades, inspiraciones, y motivaciones que mi madre siempre me ha dado a mi.
lender.occupational_info:
In honor of my mother, I loan to give other women the chance to make their own ambitions and goals come true through their own hard-work.
En honor de mi madre, yo presto para dar a otras mujeres la oportunidad de lograr todas sus ambiciones y metas por su propia dedicación y trabajo duro.

lender.name: Camilla
lender.loan_because: It´s a great opportunity to encourage people and to make a difference.

lender.name: Pepper
lender.loan_because: It's my way of keeping the universe in balance - if I do good works on the internet, I get to be SUPER BAD at home.
lender.occupational_info:
I do a lot of deconstruction work, mainly in the area of the front door.
My progress at digging my way out of the house has recently been stymied by my human; she was somewhat less than pleased to find a hole in the kitchen floor, surrounded by insulation and an extensively damaged floor joist.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I care about people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in different international bussiness and I aim to do it ethically

lender.name: Connie Kung
lender.loan_because: I wish my borrowers can benefits from the money.

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become empowered to improve their lives.

lender.name: Henk
lender.loan_because: The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Newton Campos
lender.loan_because: I research the impact of entrepreneurs in promoting socioeconomic development.

lender.name: Camilla & Totte
lender.loan_because: We would like our money to support development in the most efficient way. And we think the local entrepreneurs are most fit to identify the potential and possibilities for development in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Camilla teaches drama to pupils aged 15-18 years. Totte does safety analysis at a nuclear power plant.

lender.name: Анна
lender.loan_because: I don't wish to be everything to everyone, but I would like to be something to someone.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: It is better than charity! I am in business, just like the people i lend money too! Its about business not begging!
lender.occupational_info: I have a big hotel and restaurant, and this financial crisit is hard for everyone! I wish Kiva were here in the UK sometimes, but i only have to deal with snow and bad business days, not a war too!

lender.name: CS Cares
lender.loan_because: As the nation’s leading Debt Settlement company, Credit Solutions helps our clients deal with the burdens of financial instability every day. We strive to eliminate poverty in our community and worldwide through and investment of our time and resources.

lender.name: Tawaunna
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to want to start your own business and have no money or support. I want to help as many as I can with the dream of being a business owner.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make women clothing.

lender.name: Karen & Tim
lender.loan_because: we hope to make a difference in others lives.
lender.occupational_info: We raise funds for local and international charities that try to make the world a better place for all.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I believe the need to help others in our global community. To provide individuals with assistance to reach their dream..provide for their families is a great opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a controller/accountant for a liberal arts college.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: others can put to good use what I take for granted.

lender.name: Ezra
lender.loan_because: Jesus has planted the Kingdom of God in me. I have been given many material things and I want to make his Kingdom known by spreading justice, mercy, and generosity. God owns all things and I am happy to share.

lender.loan_because: I want to give to poeple who are less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.occupational_info: I am a 7th grader in California

lender.name: The Very Nice Book Club
lender.loan_because: We want to support other women in business.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: God said I should
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to clean up the messes created by the upper managements poor decisions

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: The purpose of life is not to be happy - but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you have lived at all. ~Leo Rosten
lender.occupational_info: Estoy estudiando dos licenciaturas en la Universidad de San Jose en California: "Español" y "Estudios Globales" con énfasis en Latin America. Me voy a graduar en este año y tengo planes de trabajar en Relaciones Internacionales. Viví en Peru por dos años como voluntario misional (en La Libertad y La Ancash). Dedido al tiempo que estuve allí, desarollé un relación especial con la gente de Latina America. Además estudiaba por un año en Burgos, España. En Perú y España he trabajado como maestro de inglés.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: i believe that sharing blessings to other people in dire need is a life satisfaction.

lender.name: Ecoline
lender.occupational_info:
At ECOLINE Windows we specialize in home renovations in your local community, which mostly consists of replacement and installation of top quality windows and doors and related products.
For over 10 years we have demonstrated a commitment to a uniform standard of excellence in our services, workmanship, and professional business ethics.
When you choose ECOLINE Windows you would expect highest quality products that offer outstanding performance and security, substantial savings due to their energy efficiency, and products that will enhance and beautify the look of your home.
At ECOLINE Windows we are committed to our customers – we settle for nothing but the best and we make sure our customers are completely satisfied with our service, which means nothing less than what we would be proud to have in our own homes.
Through innovative design, an on-going process of improving our approach, and a strong devotion to customer service, ECOLINE Windows continues to provide ecologically smart products and services to meet the unique demands of today’s society.

lender.name: angelica
lender.occupational_info: to support those small entrepreneurs achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: I know what a difference it has made in my own life, to know that someone else really cared.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping develop a system to help ensure patients who need a certain medication can still get it even during a disaster. And sometimes I do studies! Mostly, I love to write.

lender.loan_because: I would like with a small gesture to make the world lighter
lender.occupational_info: I am a technical of agriculture and help farmers to improve their work

lender.loan_because: A lack of money should never get in the way of someone fulfilling their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help aspiring models develop portfolios so they can get noticed by agencies and magazines. I get to meet interesting people all while getting to use my own creativity.

lender.occupational_info: I am an internet marketing business owner, helping large and small clients learn how to leverage their business through the internet. My business architecture consulting helps all levels of clients achieve more with the skills and talents they posses.

lender.occupational_info: I am studying the environment and how to make a better place for our children

lender.occupational_info: I do medical testing in a hospital lab. I also like to write in my spare time and sometimes get paid for it.

lender.loan_because: I believe in helping and encouraging people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for making sure that the chemicals that we produce, as a chemical company, are safe for people and for the environment; throughout their whole life cycle.

lender.occupational_info: I attempt to educate teenagers to see the vastness of the world and accept it all.

lender.loan_because: People need it.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I believe that these loans can help infiltrate poverty in families and empower communities.

lender.occupational_info: ZIP System roof and wall sheathing offers structural panels with built-in protective overlays that eliminate the need for house wrap or felt forever. Score points for green building certification by using ZIP System products.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I can't help the whole world, but I can help a couple who ask for little (by my standards) and use it to make a better life for themselves. I'm honored to be a part of this.

lender.loan_because: We believe in Kiva’s philosophy: Helping People Help Themselves.

lender.occupational_info: Husband,Father,& Lover Of Photography

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: The Lord shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations. Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because:
I'm blessed to have a wonderful family and I took the risk to start my own business and I have succeeded.
There are many people who want to start their own business and support their families but don't have the same opportunities that were available to me.
I want to help them in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph weddings, babies and families.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love to see people taking initiative to better not only thier own lives, but also the lives of their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an apartment complex. I make sure all of the apartments are rented and that all of the tenants are happy.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I like to see my money at work over and over again

lender.occupational_info: I manage a group who provide technical support for computers, printers and networks

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have any idea and want to expand upon it. I think if I can help someone do it then maybe they will be able to also someday.
lender.occupational_info: you can see some of my jewelry at etsy.com/shop/brokenbranchgold

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: A small loan on my part can make a very significant difference in someones lifestyle.

lender.occupational_info: I work on the computers in several schools keeping them working and secure.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a university where I teach psychology (the study of behaviour) and conduct research in the area of attention and memory.

lender.occupational_info: Cutting and styling hair and making people look better and feel good about them selfs,I also work with the hospital in my area and put on annual health fairs for H.I.V. to get people tested and know their status so we all can live a good and long life

lender.loan_because: I can make someone's life better.

lender.name: microsabers
lender.loan_because: We are a group of students from Campbell High School who train other students in our school about microfinance and Kiva. We hope to get many of the Campbell students aware of the needs in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We believe in promoting economic sustainability in the world. To that end, we want to empower Campbell classes as active participants in the process.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs (especially women) in developing nations to change lives and change the world

lender.name: Chandria
lender.loan_because: My children and I want to help empower families, and make a positive difference around the world.

lender.name: Wayne

lender.occupational_info: now retired, i had a successful career managing my own small business. it is time to give back

lender.loan_because: I believe Jesus has a heart for the poor and as a Jesus follower I want to extend His heart to them through the blessings I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am a community development pastor who works toward building up interpersonal connections with international communities. I live in Hong Kong and work throughout Asia.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and I want to make a difference to people who can't help themselves because they do not have the resources
lender.occupational_info: I encourage other people to create better lives for themselves and live better.

lender.name: Suzie
lender.occupational_info: Working with people.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I've always heard 2 things. Nothing feels so good as to give it away. The other is that, "the more you give the more you can receive". I would like to become friends who think and act the same way. LGBT partners welcome
lender.occupational_info: I study and study and study my product, service, competition and find a way I can be better at it. I have found that the lowest price is not the thing to make you successful. Giving the same level of high quality service and charging same fair price to everyone is very important to obtaining higher quality clients.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Small business is the way to improve economies

lender.name: roelani
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
... really? How would I describe my work? I would not; I prefer not to think about it too much on my free time, it makes my head spin.
(Seriously, it's a fun job, provided I'm given enough coffee and energy drinks.)

lender.loan_because: In honor of my adopted son and his birth parents.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance works. The sense of responsibility a loan instills within its recipient, as opposed to pure charity, incentivizes the borrower to efficiently make use of those funds, which in turn spurs development.
lender.occupational_info: Learning international laws and their complexities.

lender.name: Valerie

lender.loan_because: I like the idea and I have seen, at first hand, the success of micro finance in central asia

lender.name: DAISY

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: We live in a priviledged country, and if there is any way I can help spread some of that to others who really need it, that's what I'm going to do.
lender.occupational_info: I attend school to learn how the human brain works in regards to your feelings and personality.

I am a Bookkeeper for a production company here in the US.
I'm on Facebook, Eliza Maria Arevalo.

lender.name: Morganne
lender.loan_because: I want to be a giver in a nation of takers.
lender.occupational_info: I study, study, study, work 2 jobs then study some more. I'm a pre-med student, studying is my life currently

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am committed to microfinance as a means for people to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: As Regional Director for Europe and Asia, Michael is responsible for setting strategy, managing the portfolio of current microfinance partners, and conducting due diligence on potential partners. In 2006, Michael shifted his career into microfinance after twelve years in the retail & commercial banking industries. Prior to joining Kiva, Michael organized savings and loan clubs (ASCAs) in Sierra Leone, developed a microfinance program for a US-based nonprofit operating in the Philippines, and worked as a data analyst for an MFI in Guatemala. He holds an undergraduate degree in International Business with a concentration in finance from San Francisco State University, and graduate degrees from both St. John's College and Harvard. At Harvard, Michael focused on designing Shariah compliant microfinance products for Muslim communities, as well as researching the impacts of faith-based involvement in the microfinance industry

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe in a global community. Everyone in the world must do their part to make life better for everyone else. Stimulating economic growth in places that otherwise lack the opportunity is a fantastic idea. Each person in the world should have a certain minimum standard of living with the ability of growth beyond the minimum. My loans are one small step to make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: My experience includes writing for film, theatre, and a humor blog. I also play guitar in a rock band. Our songs can be downloaded at thespiral.bandcamp.com While attaining a Masters in Fine Arts with a focus on comedy writing, I met wife. We reside in Albuquerque, New Mexico and have no children... yet.

lender.name: Nolan Hoistad
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate

lender.name: Susan Wilson
lender.loan_because: There's not a single reason why I shouldn't!
lender.occupational_info: Counseling/Advocacy

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Hi, I'm Emily Crews, part of the Paul Davis Cares team. Here you will find Paul Davis news, information and help. Email us at PaulDavisCares@pdrestoration.com

lender.name: Angeline Aringo
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give & it's good to see other people better themselves financially too.

lender.name: Yalda
lender.loan_because: i believe in community, circles of support, independence, sustainability, and that water finds its level. pa'lante.
lender.occupational_info: ain't no power, like the power of the people because power of the people don't stop.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: Real change comes one person at a time.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I design and make clothing

lender.name: ArlSan
lender.loan_because: I am not well-to-do in the eyes of the world, but I consider myself blessed. I have been helped much and would like to help others when I have extra money to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I am an older divorced displaced homemaker and have lost much financially and career-wise. My goal is to acquire the education and skill needed in order achieve my dream to work globally...even the U.N. or other supraorganizations. My desire is to be able to leave an honorable legacy to my descendants. I would like to see my children and children's children bless others.

lender.name: carolina
lender.loan_because: Its a really great chance to help others
lender.occupational_info: Non profit, and college student,,,,

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share that
